com.xrtb.common

Class Creative

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xrtb.common.Creative

  • public class Creative
extends java.lang.Object
    An object that encapsulates the 'creative' (the ad served up and it's attributes). The creative represents the physical object served up by the bidder to the mobile device. The creative contains the image url, the pixel url, and the referring url. The creative will them be used to create the components of the RTB 2 bid
    Author:
    Ben M. Faul

      • process

        public boolean process(BidRequest br,
                       java.lang.StringBuilder errorString)
        Process the bid request against this creative.
        Parameters:
        br - BidRequest. Returns true if the creative matches.
        errorString - StringBuilder. The string to hold any campaign failure messages
        Returns:
        boolean. Returns true of this campaign matches the bid request, ie eligible to bid
